Three Eggs Spinach

Ingredients

  • 500 g Round Spinach
  • 30 g ikan bilis
  • 5 slices ginger
  • 1 tbsp oil
  • 500 ml boiling water
  • 0.5 tsp sesame oil
  • 1 salted egg room temperature
  • 1 century egg room temperature
  • 2 chicken egg room temperature
  • 1 tbsp coarse or fine salt for washing the veg

Preparation

  1. Wash the ikan bilis and drain dry.
  2. Add 1 tbsp of oil to the wok, then add the ginger and fry until fragrant, then add the ikan bilis and fry for 2 mins until fragrant.
  3. Pour in 500 ml of boiling water and le the mixture simmer for 15-20 mins under low heat, then sieve the ikan bilis stock.
  4. In another small pot, lower salted eggs into boiling water with ladle, and boil for 10-15 mins under medium heat, then allow to cool. Once cooled, remove the shell.
  5. For the century egg, remove the husky clay and wash, then remove the shell.
  6. Cut the salted egg and century egg into small cubes and set aside for later use.
  7. Crack 2 chicken eggs into a bowl. Seperate out the egg yolks from the egg whites and beat lightly.
  8. Separate the spinach leaves from the stems, then remove the fibrous skin of the stem as much as possible.
  9. Add salt to a basin of water to wash the leaves and stems seperately, then wash with water 2-3 times and drain.

Cooking

  1. Add the ikan bilis stock to the wok and bring it to a boil over medium heat.
  2. Add the spinach stems and cook for about 2 mins, then add the spinach leaves and continue coking for another 4 mins, or until soft.
  3. Add 1/2 tsp of sesame oil.
  4. Transfer the spinach into a dish, leaving the stock in the wok.
  5. When stock boils, add the salted egg and cook for about 1 min, then add the century egg and give it a gentle stir, being careful not to break up any egg cubes.
  6. Pour in the egg yolk and swirl gently for a min, then pour in the egg white into a swirl and turn off the heat.
  7. Toss the egg mixture by scooping from the bottom and flipping it over towards the wok's center.
  8. Pour the egg mixture onto the spinach and serve.

    9. Nutrition Quantity
    Calories 138kcal
    Carbohydrates 5g
    Protein 11g
    Fat 9g
    Saturated Fat 2
    Cholesterol 145g
    Sodium 449mg
    Potassium 667mg
    Fiber 2g
    Vitamin A 9679IU
    Vitamin C 28.1mg
    Calcium 112g
    Iron 3.6
